vases.description: Over the years, the timeless Sozia vase has become a genuine classic. Most people associate the vase with minimalis and functional design. Right now you are looking at the 15 cm coloured porcelain vases. The Sozia vase is available in a wide range of colours and sizes.

Bring peace, serenity, and balance to your space with Sage & Sills Shades of Neutral Ceramic Vases. Made of stunning matte ceramic, these vases feature six unique designs that make a statement by themselves or in a group. Perfect for dried flowers, grasses, or florals, these vases are sure to elevate your decor and leave you feeling zen!
Sight Unseen references Renaissance paintings and historic French ceramics in this collection of pastel-toned and nude porcelain plates and vases

The crisp lines and sharp angles of these striking ceramic vases bring a sense of artful sophistication to a tabletop, shelf, or mantel. Display flowers or use them as a focal point in your decor, these vases are compliment worthy.
